recipe.title: How to Make Blueberry Muffins
recipe.intro: Blueberry muffins are a classic cafÃ© treat. They are soft, sweet, and full of juicy blueberries.
recipe.ingredients: plain flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, butter, vanilla extract, fresh blueberries
steps: **Preheat** the oven to 190 degrees Celsius. **Place** paper cases in a muffin tray.
**Mix** the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl.
**Whisk** the egg, milk, melted butter, and vanilla in another bowl.
**Pour** the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. **Stir** until just mixed. Do not over-mix!
**Fold** the blueberries into the batter gently.
**Spoon** the batter into the paper cases. **Bake** for 20 to 25 minutes until the tops are golden. **Cool** on a wire rack.

quiz1.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Stir until just mixed. Do not over-mix!"

review.text: I stopped by Harbour Lights CafÃ© this morning before work. It is near the marina where the reef boats leave. I ordered a blueberry muffin and a long black. The muffin was soft and fluffy with lots of blueberries inside. It was still warm from the oven. The coffee was nice and strong. The view of the boats in the harbour was lovely. I always enjoy my breakfast here.

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"It is near the marina where the reef boats leave."

lines.speaker: Sarah
lines.text: Morning! Actually, I want to try something different.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Sure! We have blueberry muffins fresh out of the oven.

lines.speaker: Sarah
lines.text: Oh, that sounds perfect! I will have one of those.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Great choice! Would you like butter with it?

lines.speaker: Sarah
lines.text: No thanks. But can I have it warmed up a little?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: No problem! And your coffee? A flat white as usual?

lines.speaker: Sarah
lines.text: Actually, I will try a long black today.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Feeling adventurous! That is eleven dollars fifty, please.

lines.speaker: Sarah
lines.text: Here you go. Can I sit by the window?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Of course! That table is free. Enjoy your breakfast!

part_a.full_text: Good morning! Did you sleep well? Yes, I did. I am a bit hungry though. Me too. Do you want a muffin? I bought some yesterday. Blueberry? Yes, your favourite! Let me put the kettle on. Great. I will have tea this morning. There is milk in the fridge. Thanks! These muffins are really good.

part_b.full_text: Hello everyone, welcome to our cafÃ©. I want to tell you about our new breakfast menu. Starting next Monday, we will have three new muffin flavours: blueberry, raspberry, and lemon poppy seed. All muffins are baked fresh every morning before six o'clock. We also have a new deal. If you buy a muffin and a coffee together, you save two dollars. The deal is available every day before nine in the morning. We hope you enjoy our new menu!

try_it.example: This morning I had a blueberry muffin at the cafÃ©. It was soft and warm. I also had a long black coffee. It was a great start to the day!
